SA15bsa0554u:2_3: prīṇantyeva vi + + + + hi śiśoḥ prāyaḥ pitṛṇāṃ manaḥ //
SA15bsa0554u:3_1: yathā ghaṭādirarthaḥ / virudvadharmmādhyāsavāṃśca sthūlonīlādirartha iti vyāpakavirudvopalabdhiḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:3_3: sa cānubhavāvasito 'sati bādhake pratyakṣasidvo hetorāśrayāsidviṃ nihanti /
SA15bsa0554u:3_4: nanu bhavadbhirasannevāvayavī pratijñāyate sa kathaṃ pratyakṣasidvaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:3_5: nāvayavinamiha dharmmiṇaṃ pratipannāḥ smaḥ kintu pratibhāsamānasthūla nīlādikamartham /
SA15bsa0554u:3_6: na tarhi virudvadharmmasaṃsargādavayavina ekatvaṃ niṣidvaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa0554u:3_10: na tāvaṃdanyaḥ, dṛśyatvenābhyupagamāt / na ca pratibhāsamānasthūlanīlārthavyatirekeṇāparaḥ pratibhāti /
SA15bsa0554u:4_4: na caivaṃ mantavyaṃ / na paramāṇusañcayavādināṃ sthūlākāraḥ kaścidartho 'sti yaḥ prasidvo dharmmī syāditi /
SA15bsa0554u:4_5: avayavyanabhyupagame 'pi hi niravayavānekātmakaḥ sthūlo 'rthobhyupagamyamānaḥ kena niṣidvaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:4_6: syānmataṃ niravayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kathaṃ pratyakṣe sthūlenā kāreṇāvabhāseran,
SA15bsa0554u:4_7: sthūlasūkṣmayorvirodhāditi / tadapi na yuktaṃ / paramāṇava eva hi pararūpadeśaparihāreṇotpannāḥ parasparasahitā avabhāsamānā deśavitānavanto bhāsante /
SA15bsa0554u:4_8: vitatadeśatvañca sthūlatvaṃ, yattuktaṃ sthūlasūkṣmayorvirodha iti tat kiṃ pararūpadeśaparihāravatī niravayavānāmutpattiḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:4_11: ataeva niravayaveṣu bahuṣvekasmin vijñāne pratibhāsa māneṣu bhavan pratibhāsakālabhāvī pratibhāsadharmmaḥ sthūlākāro na tu vāstavaḥ pratyekamabhāvāt /
SA15bsa0554u:4_12: pratibhāsāt prāgūrdvaṃ vā na tarhi sthūlo 'rtha iti cet /
SA15bsa0554u:4_13: na tadāpi pratibhāsayogyatāsambhavāt yadaiva hi sañcitā bhaveyustadaiva pratibhāsayogyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:4_19: tadayaṃ nirantara eka eva sthalo niravayavānekātmako bhavitumarhati,
SA15bsa0554u:5_0: tatrāpi kimeṣāmantaraṃ vivekaḥ pararūpaśūnyatā veti cintyaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:5_3: nanu ca na pratyekaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ sthūlākāraḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:5_4: tataḥ samuditānāmeṣṭavyaḥ / yathā ca nīlaparamāṇūnāṃ pratyekamasambhavan pītākāro bahuṣvapi na dṛśyate /
SA15bsa0554u:5_5: tathā pratyekamasambhavan sthūlākāraḥ kathaṃ bahuṣu syāditi /
SA15bsa0554u:6_1: nīlavirudvastu pītākāraḥ / tataḥ pītavirudvaṃ nīlākāraṃ vibhrāṇeṣu bahuṣvapi kathaṃ pītākāro bhavet /
SA15bsa0554u:6_3: tadevaṃ pratyakṣasidvaḥ sthūlo 'rtha iha dharmmīti vyavasthitaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:6_4: tadevamavasthite dharmmiṇi hetoḥ sattvamasattvaṃ vā nirūpyaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:6_5: tatra pāṇyādāvekasmin kampamāne sthūlo 'rthaḥ sakampaniḥkampe rūpe yugapat pratipadyamānaḥ kathaṃ virudvadharmmasaṃsargavānna syāt /
SA15bsa0554u:6_9: iha ca sakampaniḥkampe rūpe gṛhṇat pratyakṣameva sāmarthyāt parasparābhāvaṃ sādhayati /
SA15bsa0554u:6_11: syādetat pāṇyādāvekasminnavayave kampamāne nāvayavinaḥ kampa rūpamabhyupeyaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:6_12: avayava eva hi tadā kriyāvān dṛśyate /
SA15bsa0554u:6_13: na cedaṃ mantavyaṃ / avayave kriyāvati tadādheyenāvayavināpi kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ,
SA15bsa0554u:6_14: yathā rathe calati tadā rūḍho 'pi calatīti /
SA15bsa0554u:6_16: nimittāyaugapadyācca / yadā hi ātmanaḥ pāṇikampanecchā bhavati /
SA15bsa0554u:6_17: tataḥ prayatnaḥ / tadā prayatnavadātmapāṇisaṃyogāt pāṇau kriyā /
SA15bsa0554u:6_18: yadā tu śarīrakampanārthaḥ prayatnaviśeṣa ātmano jāyate /
SA15bsa0554u:6_20: ato bhinnamiti tayorekasmin jāte kathaṃ nimittāntarapratibadvajanmā tadabhāve tadaparo 'pi tathaiva jāyeta /
SA15bsa0554u:6_21: ratha tadārūḍhakarmmaṇostu satyapi nimittabhede nimittayaugapadyāt sahabhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:6_24: tayośca sahabhāvāt karmmaṇī api yaugapadyena jāyete /
SA15bsa0554u:6_26: na cātrā vayavaḥ kriyāvān / avayaveṣu hi kriyāvatsu vibhāgo jāyate /
SA15bsa0554u:6_28: tena ca saṃyoge 'samavāyikāraṇe nivarttate nivarttetāvayavi dravyamiti /
SA15bsa0554u:6_29: idamāhuratra kaṇādaśiṣyāḥ / nodanādabhighātādvā jāyamānaḥ kriyāviśeṣo dravyārambhakasaṃyogapratidvandvivibhāgārambhako dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:6_34: / ayamatra samādhiḥ / ihāvayavini kriyāvati niyamenāvayavairapi kriyāvadbhirbhavitavyaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:6_35: anyathāvayavasaṃsṛṣṭebhya ākāśadeśebhyo vibhāgo 'vayavāsaṃsṛṣṭeśca saṃyogovayavinaḥ kriyāvataḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0554u:7_2: tasmādavayavini kriyāvati avayavāḥ kriyāvanta ityakāmakairapi vaiśeṣikairidamabhyupeyaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:7_3: yathā cāvayavikriyāyāmavayavāḥ kriyāvanta stathāvayaveṣvapi kriyāvatsu tadavayavaiḥ kriyāvadbhirbhāvyamiti /
SA15bsa0554u:7_4: anayā diśā dvyaṇuke kriyāvati tadārambhakau paramāṇūkriyāvantau mantavyau /
SA15bsa0554u:7_9: ekasya paramāṇoḥ kriyā na parasyeti cet /
SA15bsa0554u:7_11: tataśca dravyanāśaḥ / evañca bdyaṇukadravyasya kriyāvattve tryaṇuke 'pi kriyā syādityanena krameṇa paridṛśyamāno 'calaścalaḥ syādavayavaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:7_15: sāvayavo hi bhāva ekenāvayavena vastvantarasaṃyukta evāvayavāntarai ścalaiḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:8_1: tathāhyāvṛte ekasmin pāṇyādau sthūlasyārthasyāvṛtānāvṛte rūpe yugapadbhavantī virudvadharmmadvayasaṃyogamasyāvedayataḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:8_6: adṛṣṭireva tarhi asyāstu / na tu dṛṣṭayadṛṣṭī / nanvastyevāvayavidarśanamavayavāvaraṇe 'pīti ko 'yaṃ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:8_9: na cārdvāvaraṇe bhūyasāmavayavānāmastīndriyasannikarṣaḥ tato na sthūlagrahaṇamiti /
SA15bsa0554u:8_11: sa evānekavyāpī sthūlaḥ / tatra yadyavayavyeva sthūlaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:9_0: atha sthūlatvākhyaḥ parimāṇaviśeṣo guṇaḥ sa drabyādanya eveti cet /
SA15bsa0554u:9_7: yadyevaṃ sa eva tarhyavayavaḥ svena parimāṇena sambadvaḥ pratyakṣostvāvaraṇakālenāvayavī /
SA15bsa0554u:9_10: yasya hi mahato 'vayavasya tata parimāṇaṃ sa tāvat svena parimāṇena sambadvaḥ pratibhāti /
SA15bsa0554u:9_11: avayavinaśca tatparimāṇasambadvapratibhāsābhyupagame dvayoḥ samaparimāṇayorayavāyavavinoḥ pratibhāsa āsajyate /
SA15bsa0554u:10_2: syādetadyasyāvayavasya parimāṇenāvayavī sambadvaḥ pratibhāti sa svaṃ parimāṇaṃ parityajyābhātīti /
SA15bsa0554u:10_5: na ca bādhakamantareṇa bhrāntirapi śakyā vyavasthāpayitum /
SA15bsa0554u:11_2: paramadhyāvarttināmavayavānāmindriyasannikarṣābhāve sthūlatamāvayavidarśanānupapatteḥ syānmataṃ nikhilā vayavadarśanaṃ na sthūlapratyakṣakāraṇaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:11_4: idamapi na samyak / abhimukhāvasthitasya hi parvvatāderarvvācīnāvayavadarśanena tathā sthūlapratipattiryathārvvākparamadhyavarttināṃ darśane /
SA15bsa0554u:11_5: tato na yāvanniravaśeṣāvayavadarśanaṃ tāvat kathaṃ sthūlatamārthapratipattiḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0554u:11_8: krameṇa diśāmavayavānāṃ pratyakṣīkaraṇe pratyakṣaḥ sthūlo 'vayavīti cet /
SA15bsa0554u:11_9: anyadā tu kaḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti vimṛṣyaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:11_10: avayava iti cet / avayavī api paramadhyavarttino na yugapaddṛśyanta iti kathaṃ so 'pi pratyakṣaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0554u:11_11: tadevaṃ nāvayavī nāvayavāḥ pratyakṣā iti na kiñcidṛśyeteti /
SA15bsa0554u:12_1: tathā hyekasminnukte sthulo 'rtho raktārakte rūpe yugapat pratipadyamāno virudvarūpadvayayogamātmanaḥ prakāśayati /
SA15bsa0554u:12_2: nanva vayava eva rakto 'vayavī tvaraktaikarūpa eveti /
SA15bsa0554u:12_4: na caivaṃ / athavā rāgadravyasaṃyogo hi raktatvaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:12_5: avayavasya ca rāgadravyeṇa saṃyoge 'vayavino 'pi tena bhāvyaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:12_6: avaśyaṃ hi kāraṇasaṃyoginā kāryyamapi saṃyujyata iti samayāt /
SA15bsa0554u:12_7: yastvāha rakta evāvayavī / asti hi kuṅkumārakte paṭāvayave kuṅkumāraktaḥ paṭa iti pratyayaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:12_8: tato rāgadravyasaṃyukta evāvayavīti tasyāpi varṇāntarānavabhāsaḥ syādavayavinaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:12_9: rāgadravyaṃ hi pratyāsīdat nijarūpaṃ vastuna stirodhatte svena ca rūpeṇa dravyaṃ sambandhati /
SA15bsa0554u:12_10: yathā raktovayavastirohitasahajarūpo rāgadravyasamavāyinā rūpeṇa sambandhī pratibhāti /
SA15bsa0554u:13_3: so 'pyevaṃ paryyanuyojyaḥ / kathamavyāpyavṛttiḥ / yadi hi svāśraye samaveto rūpādivat vyāpyavṛttirevāyaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:14_0: aho mohavijṛmbhitaṃ / abhāvo hi bhāvanivṛttirūpo nāsya bhāvanivṛttiṃ hitvā rūpāntaramīkṣate /
SA15bsa0554u:14_1: yaśca yannivṛttirūpaḥ sa kathaṃ tasmin satyeva bhavati /
SA15bsa0554u:14_3: tathā hyanalaṃ paśyannapi salilārthī tatra pravartteta /
SA15bsa0554u:14_7: nanu tatra yadi jalaṃ syādupalabhyeta kimataḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:14_14: anyathā vā / tatra bhāvanivṛttirūpe 'bhāve sidve kathaṃ bhāvopalabdhirna bhrāntā syāt /
SA15bsa0554u:14_16: nāmamātrantu syāt / na ca nāmamātrādarthasya tathābhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:14_17: rūparasayostu na parasparanivṛttī rūpamiti kathaṃ tadudāharaṇamiha śobheta /
SA15bsa0554u:15_4: ucyate / iha tāvadekasmin deśe paricchidyamāne tādrūpyapracyutirasya vyavacchidyate /
SA15bsa0554u:15_7: yadi hi paricchidyamāno deśāntarasvabhāvo bhavettadā tadrūpa evopalabdho bhavet /
SA15bsa0554u:15_8: deśāntararūpantu virahayya svena rūpeṇa prakāśamāno deśo deśāntarāsaṃsṛṣṭa ityavasīyate /
SA15bsa0554u:15_9: yathā ca deśasya deśāntarāsaṃsargastathā tenādhārabhūtena deśena yadyāptaṃ rūpaṃ tadapi deśāntarasaṃsargādavicchinnaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa0554u:15_10: kathaṃ hi tena deśena vyāptaṃ rūpaṃ tadabhāvavati deśāntare vartteta /
SA15bsa0554u:15_11: yathā ekena deśena vyāpto ghaṭo na deśāntare varttate /
SA15bsa0554u:15_15: yaduta ekadeśavyāptaṃ rūpaṃ na deśāntare varttate iti /
SA15bsa0554u:15_17: tadabhāvavati deśāntare varttamāno 'pi tena deśena vyāpyeta /
SA15bsa0554u:15_19: bhāgāntarāsambhavāt / etena tannirastaṃ / yadāha kaścit / yathaikobhāvastadataddeśaṃ janayannavirudhyata iti /
SA15bsa0554u:16_0: tathāhi bhāvābhāvāveva parasparaparihāreṇa virudvau na vastunī /
SA15bsa0554u:16_2: tena yadeva vastu vastvantarapracyutimat tadeva tena virudvaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:16_5: ekakāryyanirvarttanaśaktimati ca rūpe gṛhyamāṇe kāryyāntara nirvarttanaśaktirapi paricchidyata iti /
SA15bsa0554u:16_6: kathaṃ tadabhāvaḥ / ekadeśasambadvaṃ tu rūpaṃ deśāntarasaṃsargirūpaparihāreṇopalabhyamānantadabhāvāvyabhicāri tena virudvaṃ /
SA15bsa0554u:16_7: yathātyanta sadṛśorvastunoryugapadupalabhyamānayoḥ satyapi cākārabhede dūrādanupalakṣyamāṇabhedayordeśabhedamātranimittakaṃ pratyakṣāvasitaṃ virodhamāśritya bhedo 'vasthāpyate /
SA15bsa0554u:16_8: yastvāha / yathaikaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ bhinneṣu cakṣurādiṣu varttate tadadhīnotpādatayā /
SA15bsa0554u:16_10: so 'pi deśabhedanimitte virodhe 'vasthāpyamāne vastunaḥ kāraṇabhedanimittaṃviro dhamāsañjayan na naipuṇyamātmano nivedayati /
SA15bsa0554u:16_12: amūrttatvāt / syādetat / yathā deśabhedanimitto virodhastathā kāraṇabhedanimitto 'pi syāt /
SA15bsa0554u:17_4: tadevaṃ kamparāgāvaraṇabhāvābhāvakṛte deśabhedanibandhane ca caturthe virudvadharmmasaṃsarge 'vayaviviṣaye vyavasthāpite pakṣadharmmatvaṃ sidvaṃ hetoḥ /
SA15bsa0554u:17_7: ahetorayogāt / nimittāntarasya vādarśanāt / tato virudvadharmmasaṃsarge 'pi bhavannabhedavyavahāro vyāpakaṃ nimittavattvaṃ jahyāt /
SA15bsa0554u:18_0: evaṃ mayā bahuṣu durmmatinirmmiteṣu pratyudvṛteṣu khalu dūṣaṇakaṇṭakeṣu /
